commentAnnotations.text: Immune-related has been changed to immune-mediated when describing events associated with atezolizumab to align with Investigator's Brochure v15.
Systemic immune activation has been replaced by hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis and macrophage activation syndrome per French ANSM request.
Serum pharmacokinetic/anti-drug antibody samples removed at Follow-Up as assessment was discontinued as of Version 3.
Recommended that the dose of dexamethasone is minimised to the extent clinically feasible to avoid ablating early immune activity.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Protocol Amendment 6.0: Rationale includes alignment with IB v15 and French ANSM requests.
